programme.title: Jamestown S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Disaster looms for Pedro and Maria and Silas is tested by Chacrow's move to Jamestown. Jocelyn goes all out to get the truth from Willmus.

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 134
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 133
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 2
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud S4b - EP 3
programme.desc: The funniest videos on the internet, guaranteed to Make You Laugh Out Loud. This show celebrates the amazing wealth of talented and funny animals and people to be found on the internet. Featuring the best UGC from around the world, behavioural experts and other comedy talent providing a commentary into the world of LOL.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 10
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 3
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 36
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Jennifer Aniston ("The Morning Show") and CEO of The Walt Disney Company Bob Iger (Book, "The Ride of a Lifetime: Lessons Learned from 15 Years as CEO of the Walt Disney Company"). Charlie Puth performs his new hit, "Mother".

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is B and their mission is to rescue Bobo the dog!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 7
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers are on a quest to reunite a lost Malayan tapir with its mother. But their visit to the rainforest leads them to another encounter with the Malayan tiger! Leo chances upon a dawn bat while sketching in his garden. The Junior Rangers embark on a search after sundown for the dawn bats cave.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 49
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 17
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 1
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 2
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Super Wings S4: Super Charge - EP 23
programme.desc: Jett, the adorable little red plane, continues his adventures and missions all around the world!

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth - who wants to steal their Miraculouses - from wreaking havoc on the town.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 20
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago 5 - Possession - EP 1
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Snoops - EP 12
programme.desc: The lingering mystery behind Vik's brief disappearance comes to a head as those responsible kidnap him, his father and Nadia in order to recover a priceless historical artefact. Mallory and Alix, with help from Yew Kang and Juraimi, work against the clock to rescue their friends.

programme.title: Nigella At My Table - EP 1
programme.desc: In her latest series, Nigella Lawson shares the food she cooks for family and friends. Whether offering up her fresh take on familiar classics, or creating new dishes inspired by different cuisines, Nigella ensures that everyday eating is always pleasurable, with a minimum of fuss.

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And JoJo - EP 2
programme.desc: RIA DJ Zaza is doing home-based learning (HBL) with her kids and shows us how she's coping with it. Actor Yixi shares his talent for drawing with us while Wah Banana features the silly things some people do when they have to stay at home. Finally take a listen to Abangsapau's specially composed song - All we got is each other.

programme.title: Survivor 40 - EP 10
programme.desc: For the hit reality show's landmark 40th season, 20 of the winners come back to prove how they fare against those who share the title and show who is the best of the best.

programme.title: Face
programme.desc: Lee Hyun-min, who works reconstructing faces from skulls, quits his work in an institute. The newcomer Jung Sun-young brings the skull of a victim of a serial-killer who had her whole body melted down with acid by the murderer. Hyun-min refuses the assignment, but is haunted by the ghost of the victim. He decides to reconstruct the face of the woman. As the construction progresses, he has a premonition and finds another skull buried a long time ago below the sand in a field.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 12

Understanding that the sea eagle doesn't belong in their garden, the Junior Rangers take the sea eagle to a lake where it can find food - and its partner!

These difficulties usually begin before the person is 7 years old. However, these behaviors may not be noticed until the child is older.There are three main signs, or symptoms, of AD-HD. They are- problems with paying attention, being very active (called hyperactivity), and acting before thinking (called impulsivity). In this episode we will feature a family with a child who has ADHD. The child was diagnosed with ADHD when he was at school-going age. Family share how he was diagnosed, the challenges before and after the diagnosis and how they have come up with ways to help him cope with school and at home.

Then Atul and Fitri came back but Atan does not like Fitri because he spend his time with gadgets and speaks English. Can Mak Cun penetrates China's market and can Atin outdo Feng Yin as the top student? Ramu’s mother come to Mak Cun’s house to inform her that Ramu has run away. Bob meets Ramu who is hiding in the hut. They talk and he tells Ramu about his strict father who forbids him and his siblings from playing outside. Ramu is scared to get circumcised. Kamsiah try to mend her behavior. Kamsiah shares her problem with Pak Karim as why she is living away from society.

programme.title: Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 4
programme.desc: Host: Shahril WahidIn the fourth episod of Get Fit With Me, learn the forms of exercises suitable for the senior generations to strengthen their body. Do you know the type of juice that can strengthen your bladder? Also, the medical expert will share on what are the good habits that one can practice for us to overcome Covid-19.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 1
programme.desc: After his divorce with Hani, Hanan is forced into an arranged marriage with Nawal by his mother. On the other hand, Nawal accepts her mother's suggestion to marry Hanan to hide her dark past. Hanan uses this opportunity to buy himself time to prove to Hani's family that he will change to become a better person for her and their daughter, Qalish. After divorcing Nawal, Hanan soon realises he is unable to live without her. Thus begins his quest to capture Nawal's heart and trust in him again.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 22
programme.desc: Ain's younger brother, Muaz returns home from London. Aidil offers him a job at his office as his personal assistant. Zalia is unhappy that not only her position has been replaced by someone new but her chance of getting closer to Aidil is now ruined.

programme.title: Mek Minyak
programme.desc: The story of a young man who has to pay a high dowry within a month as a condition for marriage. Mail is given a month to deliver RM15,000 dowry to Pak Mus to marry his daughter Imah. Mail without hesitation agrees to accept the terms but causes his mother Mak Munah anxiety as he expects her to provide the money. Both are at a lost on how to raise the money in such a short amount of time.

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 8
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. Emillia has become obsessed over Dhia's baby, scaring her.She reminds Dhia to honour her words about her caring for the baby before she wed Zikri.Meanwhile, Nat and Badri faces a marital conflict when Nat found out that he is having an affair.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Warna - EP 8
programme.desc: Join Suharti Ali in #StayHomewithMe Warna, live!

programme.title: Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 4
programme.desc: In the fourth episod of Get Fit With Me, learn the forms of exercises suitable for the senior generations to strengthen their body. Do you know the type of juice that can strengthen your bladder? Also, the medical expert will share on what are the good habits that one can practice for us to overcome Covid-19.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 10
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Without realizing it, Dani has fallen deeply for Raikal. She wanted to express her feelings but is unsure of her action as she still wants to keep her identity a secret from Raikal. But things get complicated when Amri begins to like Dani.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 1
programme.desc: After his divorce with Hani, Hanan is forced into an arranged marriage with Nawal by his mother. On the other hand, Nawal accepts her mother's suggestion to marry Hanan to hide her dark past. Hanan uses this opportunity to buy himself time to prove to Hani's family that he will change to become a better person for her and their daughter, Qalish. After divorcing Nawal, Hanan soon realises he is unable to live without her. Thus begins his quest to capture Nawal's heart and trust in him again.

programme.title: Atin, Atan & Mak Cun - EP 20
programme.desc: Mak Cun is going to Guangzhou, China to promote her products. While she is away, Kuntum who is back in town after 12 years in Saudi Arabia, take care of Atin and Atan. Atin helps her friends in their studies but she is disappointed when she is not selected as the Top Student. Then Atul and Fitri came back but Atan does not like Fitri because he spend his time with gadgets and speaks English. Can Mak Cun penetrates China's market and can Atin outdo Feng Yin as the top student? Ramu’s mother come to Mak Cun’s house to inform her that Ramu has run away. Bob meets Ramu who is hiding in the hut. They talk and he tells Ramu about his strict father who forbids him and his siblings from playing outside. Ramu is scared to get circumcised. Kamsiah try to mend her behavior. Kamsiah shares her problem with Pak Karim as why she is living away from society.

programme.title: E.A.T - EP 8
programme.desc: Guest: Haizad ImranIn the season finale of E.A.T, Tasha prepares some recipes suitable for Iftar in conjunction with the beginning of the month of Ramadhan. Guest starring drama thespian, Mastura Ahmad.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 22
programme.desc: Ain's younger brother, Muaz returns home from London. Aidil offers him a job at his office as his personal assistant. Zalia is unhappy that not only her position has been replaced by someone new but her chance of getting closer to Aidil is now ruined.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 20
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Manja 5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm Manja celebrates Earth Day today. Estetika looks on the lines of skincare in sustainable packages. Also in Holistik, learn on what is composting, and what you can do to save the earth. In TMI, chat with Ateeqah Mazlan on why she chooses to use organic health and cleaning products, not only for herself but for her family and son. Learn how to make Kombucha, and know its benefits in Makantiub. Also a performance from YK (Young Khalifa), with the song Me Gusta, in Spotlight.

programme.title: Empat Penjuru - EP 3
programme.desc: Salmah feels hurt that Uda has lied to her but remains apprehensive to approach her about it. After Uda give Along the cold shoulder during their family gathering, he make plans to celebrate Hari Raya in China with his family.

programme.title: Kultus - EP 11
programme.desc: Syafik moves to his condominium together with Syafie and Syakilla in order to avoid ELIXR. Meanwhile Diana finds Maira becoming more violent and erratic. Maira's obsession with Syakilla and Syafik is also getting more and more disconcerting. Worried that Maira might get Rob and herself arrested or even killed, Diana plans a daring move - to do whatever it takes to stop Maira.

programme.title: Vasantham Cafe S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bukit Batok Baby & Potong Pasir Papa gets overwhelmed as two unexpected gossips aunties visits the Caf and creates a ruckus! Meanwhile, several exciting songs and dance performance awaits including an astounding Anirudh mash-up by Abrahaam and Suma!

programme.title: Thalaimurai - National Day Telemovie - EP 1
programme.desc: Paneer, Khalid and Heng are very good friends who are part of the pioneer generation. They are still working hard to contribute to the community. However, Paneer is heart-broken when his grandson has no plans to stay in Singapore.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2016 - EP 2
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Adimai Penn
programme.desc: An evil man kills Vengaiyan's father and enslaves all his people. Vengaiyan is ignorant and wild but Jeeva helps him evolve into a valiant and wise man, who then swears to right his people.

programme.title: Lukka Chupi
programme.desc: "Luka Chuppi" is the story of Guddu a television reporter in Mathura, who falls in love with a headstrong woman Rashmi. Guddu proposes marriage and Rashmi suggests Live In. What happens when they decide to live in, but the whole traditional family joins in too? That's what Guddu and Rashmi are going to find out, in this Romantic comedy film.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 18
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Queen - EP 3
programme.desc: The first season of Queen, comprising 11 episodes, chronicles the life of Shakthi Seshadri from the age of 14 to 40. In the process, she becomes the state topper in school, a celebrated actress and one of the most sought-after politicians in the state.

programme.title: Kazhugu 2
programme.desc: Kazhugu 2 is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language comedy thriller film written and directed by Sathyasiva, starring Krishna Sekhar and Bindu Madhavi in lead roles. It is the sequel to the 2012 film, Kazhugu. Produced by singaravelan under the banner madhukkoor films. The music composed by Yuvan Shankar Raj.

Making the transition from radio's weekday morning belt to television, "Vanakkam Singai" is a 1-hour Breakfast show that aims to kick start Sundays morning with a smile. The segments will comprise of quick breakfast demonstrations , lifestyle & wellness, light-hearted discussion topics that all households can relate to.

programme.title: Pithamagan
programme.desc: Starring Vikram Suriya Laila Sangeetha Simran.Music by Ilaiyaraaja.

programme.title: She Taxi
